title: Bobbie Lamont
description: Bobbie Lamont is the author of two best-selling memoirs as well as the mother of a smart and rebellious twelve year old girl. Her marriage of nearly thirteen years is ending in divorce and she has writer's block along with a drinking problem.And then she learns that Miller Hoffman, a boy that she dated in the summer of 1990 while she stayed with her aunt in Birmingham, Alabama, has written a novel inspired by their relationship.Reading Miller's novel will unlock memories that Bobbie has kept buried inside her heart for almost twenty years. The more that she reads, the more that she remembers. And the more she remembers, the more she falls in love with Miller all over again.
author: Zelmer Wilson
